patthana23.52:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nahīnaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho hīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.52:2.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namajjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana23.52:3.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ napaṇītaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho paṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
